comment:
* @deprecated in API 16
    * Mesh builder object. It starts empty and requires you to
    * add the types necessary to create vertex and index
    * allocations.
    *

methods.name: public int getCurrentVertexTypeIndex()
methods.comment:
* @deprecated in API 16
        * @return internal index of the last vertex buffer type added to
        *         builder
        *

methods.name: public int getCurrentIndexSetIndex()
methods.comment:
* @deprecated in API 16
        * @return internal index of the last index set added to the
        *         builder
        *

methods.name: public Builder addVertexType(Type t) throws IllegalStateException
methods.comment:
* @deprecated in API 16
        * Adds a vertex data type to the builder object
        *
        * @param t type of the vertex data allocation to be created
        *
        * @return this
        *

methods.name: public Builder addVertexType(Element e, int size) throws IllegalStateException
methods.comment:
* @deprecated in API 16
        * Adds a vertex data type to the builder object
        *
        * @param e element describing the vertex data layout
        * @param size number of elements in the buffer
        *
        * @return this
        *

methods.name: public Builder addIndexSetType(Type t, Primitive p)
methods.comment:
* @deprecated in API 16
        * Adds an index set data type to the builder object
        *
        * @param t type of the index set data, could be null
        * @param p primitive type
        *
        * @return this
        *

methods.name: public Builder addIndexSetType(Primitive p)
methods.comment:
* @deprecated in API 16
        * Adds an index set primitive type to the builder object
        *
        * @param p primitive type
        *
        * @return this
        *

methods.name: public Builder addIndexSetType(Element e, int size, Primitive p)
methods.comment:
* @deprecated in API 16
        * Adds an index set data type to the builder object
        *
        * @param e element describing the index set data layout
        * @param size number of elements in the buffer
        * @param p primitive type
        *
        * @return this
        *

methods.name: public Mesh create()
methods.comment:
* @deprecated in API 16
        * Create a Mesh object from the current state of the builder
        *
        *
